answers.1: This bill, titled “Lower Energy Costs Act,” aims to lower energy costs by increasing American energy production and restoring energy leadership. As of October 22, 2025, it was passed by the House and is awaiting consideration in the Senate. It has undergone several technical corrections and amendments.

answers.6: Yes, 37 amendments have been proposed for this bill. Amendment 154 was proposed by the Manager of the House. The CBO reports that it modifies the budgetary effects of the Lower Energy Costs Act.
